Name: The Pilgrim Survival
About the game: Play an eccentric survivalist in the woods and fight waves of angry cultists to defend your house. You're armed with an automatic rifle and your sole goal is to stay alive as long as possible. The player has a limited amount of health and there are no heal items available. Explore a small-scale map with key landmarks.
